biotools.summary: TURF (Tissue-specific Unified Regulatory Features) is built on the RegulomeDB framework to prioritize regulatory variants in the non-coding regions of the human genome. It leverages information from functional genomics assays and provides prediction scores in both generic and tissue-specific/organ-specific contexts.

bioschemas.name: TURF
